nodes.title: Json Prompts
widgets_values:
# Prompt List LTXâž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸

This section contains your JSON prompt list for the image to video propmts.

- Each prompt is separated and processed individually per run.
- These prompts are used to generate:
  - **Image-to-video prompts**

nodes.title: VRGDG_PromptSplitter_General-LTX prompts
widgets_values:
{
  "prompt1": "A close-up cinematic shot in a dimly lit bedroom at night reveals a woman in her mid-20s, with dark brown hair falling past her shoulders, tousled with a relaxed side part, and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie. Her lips are slightly parted, and her wide eyes slowly shift as she sings with passion, her breath subtly fogging the air, exhibiting apprehension and anticipation, as low-key lighting from a hidden lamp casts soft shadows across her face. The camera, initially holding this close-up, subtly orbits around her face, slightly pushing in, enhancing the dark, visceral atmosphere.",
  "prompt2": "An extreme close-up cinematic shot in a bedroom at night, enveloped in deep shadows, frames a woman in her mid-20s, with dark brown hair and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie, her lips almost brushing the ear of a man, in his mid-20s with short blond hair, blue eyes, and light stubble, wearing a fitted black t-shirt. As she sings with passion, her lips gently brush his ear while he quietly listens, his subtle breathing visible, a sliver of practical light subtly defining their profiles, emphasizing obsessive intimacy and unspoken secrets. The camera holds this extreme close-up, then executes a very slow, subtle orbit around their entwined heads, maintaining the tight focus.",
  "prompt3": "A close-up cinematic shot in a bedroom at night reveals a man in his mid-20s, with short blond hair, blue eyes, and light stubble along his jawline, wearing a fitted black t-shirt. His jawline is visibly tensed with a subtle clench, his eyes slowly blinking as he breathes, emphasizing a state of tension, illuminated by high-contrast lighting with a cool blue tone, sculpting his features with deep shadows that reflect a dark and visceral emotional context. The camera holds this close-up on his face, then very subtly pushes in, intensifying the focus on his tensed jaw.",
  "prompt4": "A close-up cinematic shot in a bedroom at night, featuring a dark bedsheet under dim, obscured lighting, frames two hands: one with a dark pink hoodie cuff visible, and the other with a black t-shirt sleeve visible. Their fingertips hover inches apart, not quite touching, with subtle tremors indicating illicit tension and obsessive intimacy, as the dim lighting highlights the texture of the bedsheets, enhancing the dark and visceral aesthetic. The camera holds this close-up on the hovering fingertips, then very slowly pushes in, capturing the minute movements and emphasizing the unspoken desire.",
  "prompt5": "A medium close-up cinematic shot in a bedroom at night frames a woman in her mid-20s, with dark brown hair falling just past her shoulders, tousled with a relaxed side part, and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie. Her face is slightly turned away, her eyes half-closed, as she sings with passion, her breath subtly rising, giving the appearance of withdrawal and inner conflict, illuminated by low-key lighting from a hidden lamp, with her face partially obscured by shadow and bathed in dim light. The camera holds this medium close-up, then executes a slow, subtle pull-back, emphasizing her quiet withdrawal and the isolating space.",
  "prompt6": "An extreme close-up cinematic shot at a kitchen counter at night frames a man in his mid-20s, with short blond hair, blue eyes, and light stubble along his jawline, wearing a fitted black t-shirt. His lips are visible as he sips from a glass of water, a glint of light catching on the rim of the glass and the moisture on his lips, displaying intense focus or suppressed emotion as his throat subtly moves while swallowing. A practical warm amber light catches the edge of the glass and casts sharp reflections, contributing to the dark and visceral aesthetic. The camera holds this extreme close-up on his lips, then slowly pans slightly to his tensed jawline as he sips.",
  "prompt7": "A medium close-up cinematic shot in a kitchen counter area at night frames a woman in her mid-20s as she sings with passion, with dark brown hair falling just past her shoulders, tousled with a relaxed side part, and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans. She watches from a distance, her expression showing weariness and a subtle, unreadable quality, half-hidden in shadow, as she sings with passion, her gaze slowly shifting, creating a distinct visual sense of emotional distance. Cool blue tones from outside mix with a faint practical light, implying a dark and visceral psychological hold. The camera holds this medium close-up, then executes a slow, subtle pull-back, revealing more of the empty space around her, enhancing the isolation.",
  "prompt8": "A wide shot cinematic image in a hallway at night, where a single, distant light source creates long, dramatic shadows, captures a distorted, elongated shadow of a male figure stretching starkly across a textured wall. The shadow subtly shifts and elongates, creating a haunting presence and unseen influence, with minimal other detail visible in the frame, emphasizing the dark and visceral aesthetic. The camera holds this wide shot, then executes a slow, deliberate pan across the textured wall, following the subtle, eerie shifts of the elongated shadow, intensifying the sense of unseen influence.",
  "prompt9": "A close-up cinematic shot in a hallway at night, characterized by deep shadows, frames the lower back of a woman, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans, pressed against a wall. The hoodie is slightly wrinkled as a man's hand, with a black t-shirt sleeve visible, hovers closely to her waist, not quite touching, depicting intense, illicit tension and obsessive closeness, as she sings with passion and he listens, their subtle breathing causing the fabric to shift. A high-contrast sliver of light illuminates the space between their bodies, contributing to the dark and visceral narrative. The camera holds this close-up on their bodies, then subtly pans down and in towards the space between their hands and the wall, accentuating the illicit tension while panning slightly down.",
  "prompt10": "A close-up cinematic profile/side view in a hallway at night frames a man in his mid-20s, with short blond hair, blue eyes, and light stubble along his jawline, wearing a fitted black t-shirt. A subtle smirk plays on his lips, and one of his eyes catches a dangerous glint in the dim light, his gaze slowly shifting, suggesting manipulative power and visceral intimacy, as low-key lighting sculpts his profile, emphasizing the dark and obsessive narrative. The camera holds this close-up profile, then executes a very slow push-in, subtly orbiting to capture the dangerous glint in his eye and the deepening smirk.",
  "prompt11": "A medium close-up shot in a dark bedroom at night shows a mid-20s woman with dark brown, slightly tousled hair and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans. Her face is tilted slightly back, eyes closed, as she sings with passion, her breath shallow and chest gently rising. Soft light from a hidden lamp gently illuminates one cheek, creating deep shadows that contrast with the subtle light, emphasizing the intimate and vulnerable atmosphere. The camera performs a slow, subtle push-in towards her face, then gently tilts down to her collarbone, capturing the dark, visceral, and tense mood.",
  "prompt12": "An extreme close-up shot in a bedroom at night focuses on the neck and collarbone area of a mid-20s woman who is singing with passion. she is wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie, her skin gently shifting with subtle breathing. Low-key, high-contrast lighting creates deep, dramatic shadows that highlight the texture of her skin on her collarbone, suggesting a delicate physical sensation. The camera slowly orbits around her collarbone, emphasizing the stark interplay of light and shadow, capturing the dark, intimate, and visceral mood.",
  "prompt13": "A close-up shot in a bedroom at night focuses on the intertwined hands of a mid-20s woman and a mid-20s man. The woman wears a dark pink oversized hoodie, and the man wears a fitted black t-shirt. Their fingers are gripping each other tightly, showing visible tension with subtle flexing and releasing of their powerful grip. Dim, intimate lighting with subtle cool blue accents emphasizes the emotionally charged contact. The camera performs a slow, circular orbit around their clasped hands, intensifying the dark and intense atmosphere.",
  "prompt14": "A medium close-up shot in a bedroom at night captures a mid-20s woman with dark brown hair and a mid-20s man with short blond hair. The woman, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie singing with passion, has her hand visible against the man's fitted black t-shirt, pulling him closer as she sings, her face showing an intense, focused expression. The man quietly listens, his face partially obscured, his body subtly reacting to her pull. Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting emphasizes the physical pull between them through sharp contrasts of light and deep shadow. The camera performs a slow push-in towards the woman's face, then drifts down to her hand, highlighting the fraught tension and dark, visceral mood.",
  "prompt15": "A close-up shot in a bedroom at night focuses on the mid-20s woman's face as she sings with passion, with dark brown hair, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie. As she sings with passion, low light creates deep shadows around her wide-open eyes, with a single highlight catching on her forehead. Her breath appears visibly shallow, her chest subtly rising and falling, and a flush of crimson color spreads on her cheeks. The camera performs a slow, subtle push-in towards her wide-open eyes, then smoothly arcs around her face to reveal the deep shadows, reflecting her dark, intimate, and intensely focused visceral emotional state.",
  "prompt16": "A medium shot in a dark hallway at night shows a mid-20s woman with dark brown hair, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans, pressed against a dark wall. A mid-20s man with short blond hair, wearing a fitted black t-shirt, stands close in front of her, his body near hers. As she sings with passion, subtle breathing visible, he quietly listens, their forms in stark relief from high-contrast backlighting originating from a distant room. The camera performs a slow push-in, then subtly arcs around their figures, emphasizing their close physical proximity, creating a dark, tense atmosphere.",
  "prompt17": "Mid close-up shot in a narrow concrete hallway at night, framing a woman in a dark pink hoodie pressed against the wall as she sings with passion as a man in a fitted black t-shirt leans in close, his arm braced beside her head. Her fingers tighten subtly around his forearm while her back rests against the rough surface. The camera performs a slow, steady dolly in, heightening the claustrophobic tension. The corridor stretches into darkness behind them. Overhead fluorescent lighting casts cool hard light with faint shadows sculpting their faces. The tone is intimate, tense, and emotionally charged.",
  "prompt18": "A close-up shot in a hallway at night reveals a mid-20s woman's face with dark brown hair, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie. As she sings with passion, her eyes remain closed, her breath shallow, and subtle tension shifts across her features. Hidden light sources cast isolating shadows on her face, while a faint crimson glow reflects on her eyelids, highlighting the vivid crimson accent against the deep shadows. The camera performs a slow push-in towards her closed eyes, then subtly arcs to reveal the interplay of light and shadow, capturing the dark, intimate, and tense, visceral mood.",
  "prompt19": "A medium close-up shot in a hallway at night shows a mid-20s woman with dark brown hair, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie, and a mid-20s man with short blond hair, wearing a fitted black t-shirt. They stand very close, their faces almost touching. As she sings with passion, her breath is shallow, and subtle movements of their bodies betray their tension, while he quietly listens. Cool blue tones permeate the entire scene, deepening the shadows around them and emphasizing their tight proximity. The camera performs a slow push-in towards their faces, then subtly orbits around them, capturing the dark, intimate, and intensely focused atmosphere.",
  "prompt20": "A wide shot on a wet, deserted quiet street at night shows a mid-20s woman with dark brown hair, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans, and a mid-20s man with short blond hair, wearing a fitted black t-shirt and jeans. They stand together under a lone streetlight, subtle shifts in their posture and breathing visible as she sings with passion and he quietly listens. The wet pavement reflects distorted streetlights in a shimmering pool of silver and charcoal below their feet, emphasizing their stark isolation within the dark, atmospheric scene. The camera performs a very slow push-in towards the figures, then subtly glides to the side, maintaining focus on their connection.",
  "prompt21": "A medium close-up on a quiet street at night shows a male character, with short blond hair and light stubble along his jawline, standing with an intense, fixed gaze as he slowly shifts his weight, exhaling a visible breath into the cool night air. He wears a fitted black t-shirt and jeans, with light drizzle glistening on his face, hair, and stubble, illuminated by the cold glow of a streetlight. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and cinematic low light, conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera subtly orbits him at chest height, capturing the nuanced tension in his face and the glint of wetness, before performing a slow, slight pull-back to reveal more of the wet street.",
  "prompt22": "A close-up shot on a quiet street at night features a female character, with dark brown hair falling just past her shoulders and wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie, as she sings with passion. Subtle shadows play across her face, illuminated by cold streetlights, revealing a flicker of doubt and hurt in her brown eyes, and she subtly clenches her hands inside her oversized hoodie. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and cinematic low light, conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera begins as a close-up on her face, subtly pushing in to capture the nuanced emotions in her eyes, then executes a slow, deliberate tilt down to reveal her hands clenching at the fabric of her dark pink oversized hoodie.",
  "prompt23": "An extreme close-up on a quiet street at night captures a male characterâ€™s lips, framed by light stubble, as they slowly form a faint, ambiguous smile, hinting at insincerity, while a subtle breath escapes. Harsh, isolating light highlights his mouth, contributing to the dark, visceral, high-contrast, and cinematic low-light aesthetic that conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera, starting as an extreme close-up, subtly pushes in, then performs a slow, deliberate pan downwards, away from his unseen face, maintaining the focus on his expressive mouth.",
  "prompt24": "A close-up shot on a quiet street at night captures a male characterâ€™s hand, wearing a fitted black t-shirt sleeve, extending tentatively towards a female characterâ€™s arm, clad in a dark pink oversized hoodie sleeve, as her arm slightly tenses while she sings with passion. Wet reflections from a distant streetlight shimmer around them, partially obscuring both figures in the dark. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and cinematic low light, conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera begins as a close-up on their hands, slowly pushing in to emphasize the almost-touch, then subtly arcs around their arms at waist height, revealing more of the glistening wet pavement and stark contrast.",
  "prompt25": "Low angle wide shot of a rain-soaked cobblestone street at night, with a woman standing still in blue jeans and dark leather boots partially visible at the top of the frame. Her feet shift subtly, sending faint ripples through shallow puddles. The camera remains at ground level and performs a slow, deliberate zoom inward toward the glossy wet pavement, gradually filling the frame with shimmering reflections and textured water patterns. The empty street fades into soft darkness. Cool night air and light rainfall create a quiet, somber atmosphere. Sodium streetlights cast warm reflections against deep blue shadows, producing a tense, melancholic tone.",
  "prompt26": "A medium shot on a quiet street at night shows a female character who is singing with passion, her mouth moving to the lyrics of the song. She has dark brown hair falling past her shoulders and wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans, as she subtly shifts her weight to the beat of the song, and her chest slowly rises and falls while she sings with passion, looking determinedly forward. Her silhouette is partially defined by the single, stark streetlight on the wet pavement. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and cinematic low light, conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera, starting as a medium shot, slowly pushes in towards her at chest height, then performs a gentle, slow arc around her, maintaining her determined gaze in the frame.",
  "prompt27": "An over-the-shoulder shot on a quiet street at night, from the perspective of a female character, whose dark brown hair and dark pink oversized hoodie frame the foreground, shows her subtly turning her head, exhaling a soft breath as she sings with passion, to look back at a male character. He stands under a distant streetlight, his figure, with short blond hair and wearing a fitted black t-shirt, bathed in cool blue light and silhouetted against the wet, reflective ground, subtly shifting his weight as he listens quietly. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and cinematic low light, conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera, starting as an over-the-shoulder shot, performs a slow, subtle side tracking move, emphasizing the distance and tension between them.",
  "prompt28": "A close-up in a bedroom at night shows a female character, with dark brown hair and wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie, in a very tight embrace with a male character, with short blond hair and a fitted black t-shirt. Her head rests on his shoulder, her fingers subtly tightening their grip on his t-shirt as she exhales softly, singing with passion, while he subtly shifts his weight, quietly listening. Soft, enveloping light accentuates the curves and closeness of their forms. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and cinematic lighting, conveys an intimate mood. The camera, beginning as a close-up on their embrace, slowly orbits them at shoulder height, capturing the subtle sway of their bodies and the gentle movement of her hair, before a deliberate tilt downwards to emphasize her gripping fingers and the fabric of his t-shirt.",
  "prompt29": "An extreme close-up in a bedroom at night shows the junction of a female characterâ€™s neck and a male characterâ€™s shoulder. Dark brown hair spills over his black t-shirt as she subtly shifts her head, exhaling a soft breath while singing with passion, and a single vein visibly pulses on her skin. He subtly tenses his shoulder, quietly listening. Deep shadowy chiaroscuro illuminates only slivers of skin and fabric, creating a claustrophobic sense of intimacy within the dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and dramatic lighting, conveying an intimate and tense mood. The camera, starting as an extreme close-up, slowly pushes in even further, emphasizing the pulsing vein and subtle skin movement, then performs a gradual, downward pan along the maleâ€™s t-shirt sleeve, away from their unseen faces.",
  "prompt30": "A close-up shot in a bedroom at night features a female characterâ€™s mouth, her lips slightly parted as if gasping, bathed in a stark, isolating light, as she sings with passion. Tension visibly tightens around her mouth, framed by her dark brown hair and the subtle movement of her dark pink oversized hoodie. The dark, visceral aesthetic, with muted colors, high contrast, and dramatic lighting, conveys a tense and melancholic mood. The camera, beginning as a close-up on her mouth, slowly pushes in to emphasize the subtle quiver of her lips and the visible intake of breath, then performs a slow, subtle downward tilt, away from her unseen face, highlighting the texture of her hoodie.",
  "prompt31": "A macro shot captures the skin on a woman's arm, adorned by a dark pink oversized hoodie, in a bedroom at night. As she sings with passion, a faint, bruise-like mark on her skin, barely perceptible like a pressure point, is highlighted by an intense, focused light source against a deep blue background. Subtle, realistic movements ripple through the fabric of her hoodie. The mood is visceral and psychologically intense, with cinematic high contrast and deep shadows. The camera, initially fixed on the skin, subtly glides and arcs around the arm, emphasizing the mark.",
  "prompt32": "A close-up cinematic shot focuses on a woman's face in a bedroom at night. She has dark brown hair, brown eyes, and wears a dark pink oversized hoodie. As she sings with passion, her breath causes subtle movements in her hair, and a cold, isolating light illuminates her features, emphasizing a deep, lingering sadness and vulnerability in her eyes. The mood is dark and psychologically intense, with cinematic high contrast and deep shadows. The camera holds steady, then performs a slow, subtle orbit around her face, intimately capturing her emotional depth.",
  "prompt33": "A close-up cinematic shot focuses on a woman's hand, clad in a dark pink oversized hoodie, pressing against the fabric over her heart in a bedroom at night. As she sings with passion, her fingers subtly curl and release, conveying an internal presence. Shadowy charcoals dominate the scene, with a subtle silver glint catching on her fingers. The low, high-contrast lighting contributes to a visceral and psychologically intense mood. The camera holds this intimate shot, then slowly tilts down, emphasizing the tension in her curled fingers.",
  "prompt34": "An extreme close-up cinematic shot captures a patch of a woman's glistening skin, possibly on her shoulder or arm, in a bedroom at night. As she sings with passion, her skin appears impossibly smooth and wet, catching the soft, seductive glow from a hidden light source, emphasizing texture and sensuality. Subtle movements in the dark pink oversized hoodie fabric suggest her breathing. The overall mood is intimate and visceral, with a high-contrast, dark aesthetic. The camera gently glides across the skin, highlighting its delicate sheen.",
  "prompt35": "An extreme close-up cinematic shot reveals a woman and a man, their faces pressed cheek-to-cheek, almost merging, in a bedroom at night. The woman, with dark brown hair and a dark pink oversized hoodie, sings with passion, her soft breaths subtly moving his short blond hair as he, in a fitted black t-shirt, quietly listens. Their intertwined features are softly blurred in deep shadow, illuminated by very low-key, high-contrast lighting, creating a powerful sense of merging identities. The camera holds this intensely intimate moment, slowly arcing around their faces.",
  "prompt36": "A medium shot in a dimly lit bedroom at night shows a woman sitting alone on the edge of a bed singing with passion. She has dark brown hair, brown eyes, and wears a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans. As she sings with passion, her chest gently rises and falls, and she gazes towards an empty doorway, emphasizing the palpable absence around her. The lighting accentuates the empty space, contributing to an isolated and vulnerable mood, with cinematic high contrast and deep shadows. The camera performs a slow pull-back, expanding the frame to reveal her solitude.",
  "prompt37": "A close-up cinematic shot captures a woman's hand, in a dark pink oversized hoodie, slowly tracing her own forearm in a bedroom at night. As she sings with passion, her fingers gently explore her skin, as if trying to feel something beneath the surface. Shadowy charcoals dominate the scene, evoking deep introspection, with low, high-contrast lighting contributing to a visceral and psychologically intense mood. The camera tracks the subtle movement of her hand as it glides along her arm.",
  "prompt38": "A low angle cinematic shot frames a woman standing alone in a long, dark apartment hallway at night. She has dark brown hair, brown eyes, and wears a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans. As she sings with passion, her breath faintly mists the air, and her figure appears small against the stretching, oppressive shadows emanating from a hidden light source. The mood is isolated and dark, with cinematic high contrast and deep shadows. The camera slowly pulls back, exaggerating the hallway's length and her solitude.",
  "prompt39": "An extreme close-up cinematic shot captures a woman's wide eye, reflecting a tiny, distorted image of a hallway, in a bathroom at night. As she sings with passion, her eyelid subtly twitches, and a single tear slowly begins to form, illuminated by a stark, isolating light. The mood is raw, vulnerable, and psychologically intense, with cinematic high contrast and deep shadows. The camera holds this extreme close-up, then performs a very slow, controlled push-in, magnifying the tear's formation.",
  "prompt40": "A symmetrical, centered cinematic shot captures a woman's reflection in a steamy bathroom mirror at night. She has dark brown hair, brown eyes, and wears a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans. As she sings with passion, her breath subtly mists the glass, and her reflection stares intently at herself, illuminated by a cold, stark overhead light that creates deep shadows behind her. The mood is introspective and isolated, with cinematic high contrast and deep shadows. The camera maintains its symmetrical framing, then performs a slow, deliberate push-in towards her intense reflection.",
  "prompt41": "A close-up shot of a woman with dark brown, tousled hair and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans, as her steady reflection fills a stark bathroom mirror at night as she sings with passionate intensity, her unreadable expression conveying calm resignation, while the cold artificial light casts deep, clinical shadows around the mirror's edges. The camera slowly pushes in on her face, then gently tilts down to capture her hands, which slightly tense and relax at the bottom of the frame, before slowly pulling back to her face, all within a muted, desaturated, cool-toned palette, maintaining an intense psychological drama.",
  "prompt42": "An extreme close-up shot features the reflection of a woman's lips in a stark bathroom mirror at night, her dark brown hair and dark pink oversized hoodie implied beyond the frame. Her lips are slightly parted, showing steady, calm breathing as she silently sings with a focused, passionate intensity. The cold artificial light creates high contrast, sharply emphasizing the contours of her mouth amid deep shadows. The camera holds an extreme close-up on the reflection, slowly tracking slightly left, then subtly tilting down as if following a slight head movement, before slowly tracking back to the right, maintaining a tense, clinical mood of intimate psychological intensity within a muted, desaturated, cool-toned palette.",
  "prompt43": "A medium shot shows a woman with dark brown, tousled hair and brown eyes, wearing a dark pink oversized hoodie and blue jeans, standing at eye-level before her reflection in a stark bathroom mirror at night. Her posture and appearance are mirrored perfectly as her shoulders subtly rise and fall with each breath, her ambiguous expression suggesting contemplation of a new reality while she sings with a quiet, passionate hum. Cold, stark artificial light from above illuminates her and the mirror, casting sharp contrasts and deep shadows. The camera holds the medium shot, slowly tracking backward to reveal more of the clinical bathroom space, before arcing slightly to the right, then gently pushing back in on her pensive face, maintaining an introspective, somber, dark psychological drama within a muted, desaturated, cool-toned palette."
}

nodes.title: SRT file
widgets_values:
# SRT file for beat batched scenes

If your using the new prompt creator that creates the SRT file for beat matches scenes you must enter the path to the file in here so it can be used. If you want to use normal duration mode just set the duration settings to your choice and do not enter anything here.

nodes.title: Remake mode
widgets_values:
# Move bad clips to remake folder

At the end of the run, you can move clips you don't like to the remake folder. Then turn on "use remake folder" and hit run. It will remake the clips for you. If you do this more than once make sure to delete any temp files from the folder first.

nodes.title: Nano Banana
widgets_values:
# Nano Banana + Image Switch Notes ðŸŒ

Use the Nano Banana node with image switch nodes to attach reference images directly to prompts.

- Supports unlimited # of reference images** when using Nano B.
- Image switch nodes control which reference image is active.
- Designed for prompt-by-prompt reference handling.
- When the **Prompt Creator workflow** is used, each prompt
  automatically receives the correct reference image.
- No manual reassignment needed per batch.

nodes.title: WALK THROUGH VIDOE
widgets_values:
# Full Workflow Walkthrough Video

This video walks through the complete Nano Banana process  
from start to finish using a real video project.

### ðŸŽ¬ Walkthrough Video
ðŸ”— [Watch the Video](https://youtu.be/06bPil9vrPk)

Shows full setup, prompt workflow, reference image usage,
and the exact process used to produce the final result.

A cinematic photograph of these two young women sitting on the hood of a vintage car during golden hour.  The sky is warm with pink clouds, the mood is nostalgic. Camera is angled slightly above, capturing the moment from the carâ€™s windshield. Natural color tones.

subgraphs.name: Auto Get folder name and audio file

widgets_values:
name = input_text.strip()
name = re.sub(r"\.[^.]*$", "", name)   # like os.path.splitext(...)[0]
name = re.sub(r"[^A-Za-z0-9]", "", name)
result = name

inputs.text: A medium close-up shot features a Caucasian man with a closely shaven head and face, wearing a black baseball cap with "PNTR" in white letters on the front, and a dark grey t-shirt with "JUST DO IT" visible across his chest. A small black microphone is clipped to his shirt collar. He is positioned slightly to the left of the frame, looking intently downwards and to his right, his eyes focused off-camera. His facial expression is one of deep concentration, with his brow slightly furrowed. As he looks down, a quick sniff sound is heard, and then he speaks with a deep male voice and a slightly frustrated tone, saying, "I think it's so bad." The camera remains static throughout, maintaining a shallow depth of field, which keeps the man in sharp focus while the background is softly blurred, revealing a light-colored wall with white wooden shelving or trim, and a partially open white wooden door on the right. After a brief pause, another short, audible sniff is heard. The man then continues to speak, his voice maintaining the same quality, as he states, "So bad. So bad." He elaborates further, emphasizing his point with a final statement, "This got to be, it's got to be the worst tool I've ever seen."
